name: Weakling Journey
description:
Game jam project- 13.03.20 

Weakling Journey

This is a game, where you are weak and become STRONK.

[Controls] A and S to walk, H to attack, Space to jump

Music in this game has come from https://www.facebook.com/freegamemusic/

If you liked Weakling Journey, please consider playing our other game [UwU Shooter] https://gamejolt.com/games/spacegame/475319
